text: @sunriseon7 Still working on that herd immunity for COVID19’s cousins, common cold & many flu strains. We keep getting them...yet no immunity. Where is verified & verifiable evidence that having it once provides immunity? I am not your guinea pig, @LiberalAus @ScottMorrisonMP #BrendanMurphy
